Title: A Database for the Analysis of Program Change Patterns
Published: Fourth International Conference on Networked Computing and Advanced Information Management
Purpose: Program change pattern, Data Base Schema
UseOF-SZZ: to identify those changes which actually introduced the bug
Summary:
They use the probability of bug introducing and bug fix-introducing
changes to identify the source file as being risky or not for further changes.
Outcome:
presented a database schema and a way for
calculating the risk value for a file, The files which
have higher risk values are more risky when applying
the next change and thus should be tested more thoroughly.
